## randNormS2 variable

Sets `v` to random vector, normalized to length `n` (default: 1). If no `rnd` instance is given, uses [SYSTEM](./random.system.md)<!-- -->, i.e. `Math.random`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
randNormS2: VecOpSOO<number, IRandom>
```
